item.description:
**I will be out of town on a business trip - Steve (assistant organizer) will host this event.**

First Friday of the month, 6:30-9:30 pm

Join us on the first Friday of every month in the majestic Koch Gallery for a spirited evening of socializing. Enjoy music, cocktails, friends new and old, and fine art. There is no other way to start the month!

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Museum Members: entry is FREE.
Non-Museum members: entry is FREE with Museum admission.

*Meeting details - This place gets crowded as the night progresses, so try to get there early. The Koch Gallery is on the 2nd floor, and we will meet next to the live band/DJ. If you plan on coming after 8pm, you will be better off calling Steven (617)671-5310 (the contact person) to find out the whereabouts of our group.* ** Afterwards we will head out to VOX for all interested parties.**

For more information, see http://www.mfa.org/ca...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Museum of Fine Arts - MFA First Fridays
